        getPreferredSize in class javax.swing.JComponent

      • setForceMinimumSize

        public void setForceMinimumSize(boolean force)
        Forces the minimum size of the toolbar to show all buttons, When set to true. By default (false) the toolbar will shrink further and show the auto popup chevron button.

      • setForceShowFirstComponent

        public void setForceShowFirstComponent(boolean showFirstComponent)
        By default minimum size is to show chevron only. If this option is true toolbar shows at least one (the first) component plus chevron (if need)

      • setSkipWindowAdjustments

        public void setSkipWindowAdjustments(boolean skipWindowAdjustments)
        This option makes sense when you use a toolbar inside JBPopup When some 'actions' are hidden under the chevron the popup with extra components would be shown/hidden with size adjustments for the main popup (this is default behavior). If this option is true size adjustments would be omitted

      • getMinimumSize

        public java.awt.Dimension getMinimumSize()

        getMinimumSize in class javax.swing.JComponent

      • getSeparatorColor

        protected java.awt.Color getSeparatorColor()

      • adjustTheSameSize

        public void adjustTheSameSize(boolean value)
        Description copied from interface: ActionToolbar
        If the value is true then the all button on toolbar are the same size. It very useful when you create "Outlook" like toolbar. Currently this method can be considered as hot fix.
        Specified by:
        adjustTheSameSize in interface ActionToolbar

      • setMinimumButtonSize

        public void setMinimumButtonSize(java.awt.Dimension size)
        Description copied from interface: ActionToolbar
        Sets minimum size of toolbar button. By default all buttons at toolbar has 25x25 pixels size.
        Specified by:
        setMinimumButtonSize in interface ActionToolbar

      • getOrientation

      • updateActionsImmediately

        public void updateActionsImmediately()
        Description copied from interface: ActionToolbar
        Forces update of the all actions in the toolbars. Actions, however, normally updated automatically every 500 ms.
        Specified by:
        updateActionsImmediately in interface ActionToolbar
